page.title: 14RECREATION
page.content: Miss Leckenby who lives at Forge Cottage says that gardening has always been popular in Bilsdale. People like it because it is a good hobby to do in their spare time.On average people grow the same amount of vegetables as they do flowers.Roses have many more varieties now ,they used to be only red and white.Miss Leckenby likes the old fashioned flowers but she also likes the new hybrid varieties which are bigger and have better colours. Dahlias and Begonias are difficult to grow due to the late frosts and the high winds.Garden centres which are a recent arrival give gardeners agood idea about habits of flowers and whether they will suit their garden. People here love daffodils and snowdrops but Miss Leckenby really loves sweet peas and chrysanthemums.
